```{r}
# load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
library(data.table)
library(survey)
```

```{r}
# read in main data
cididata_raw <-
  fread("ukrmain_RU_061419.csv")
```

```{r}
# read in DSM data
dsm_raw <-
  read_spss("ukraine_dia.sav")
```

```{r}
# subsetting data
cididata <-
  cididata_raw %>%
  select(sampleid, AGE, SEX, pt1, io15, de13, io16, sc8, de20_1, fnu4, mr22, 
         mr37, sc3, sc3a, de32_1, de32_2, de32_3, de32_4, de32_5, de32_6, de32_7, 
         de32_8, de32_9, de32_98, de32_99, de33, de34, mr22, sn1, sn2, sn6, sn7, sc7, 
         cc1tz, cc28a, cc28b, cc28c, cc28d, cc28e, cc28f, cc28g, cc20a, cc20b, 
         cc20c, cc20d, cc26a, cc26b, cc26c, sd2, sd4, sd6, sd15, sd17, sd19, su8, 
         secu, strata, weight2)
```
